com.mycompany.icp_2151_lab_1

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.icp_2151_lab_1.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends Object
    Responds to the CLI executing SQL statements against the Database with the selected command
    Since:
    26/2/14
    Author:
    Michael Smith, Huw Padrig Price

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseManager()
      Searches for the properties file to find the connection parameters for the database

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseManager

        public DatabaseManager()
                throws IOException,
                       ClassNotFoundException,
                       SQLException
        Searches for the properties file to find the connection parameters for the database
        Throws:
        IOException - if the properties file cannot be found
        ClassNotFoundException - if the contents of the properties file are incorrect
        SQLException - if there is a connection or SQL syntax issue with the database
